Interface Terminal.TerminalEventListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    Terminal

    public static interface Terminal.TerminalEventListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    Event Listener for the Terminal class

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void OnTerminalStatus(java.util.EventObject ev)
      This event is fired when the online status of the terminal changes.

    • Method Detail

      • OnTerminalStatus

        void OnTerminalStatus(java.util.EventObject ev)
        This event is fired when the online status of the terminal changes.

        Note : The Terminal.isOnline() method shows the current state of the terminal
